sentences.en: Don't expect me to come and visit you there.
sentences.cn: 别指望我会去那儿看你。

sentences.en: Don't leave a child alone in a room with an open fire.
sentences.cn: 房间里有裸露的明火时，不要让孩子独处其中。

sentences.en: Don't think it hasn't torn me apart to be away from you.
sentences.cn: 不骗你，离开你让我痛苦万分。

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: He donned his cloak and gloves.
sentences.cn: 他穿戴上他的披风和手套。

sentences.en: Heck, if you don't like it, don't vote for him.
sentences.cn: 如果你不喜欢，不要投他的票不就得了。

sentences.en: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless.
sentences.cn: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

sentences.en: I don't know that it's made the decision any easier.
sentences.cn: 我不认为这对作出决定有丝毫帮助。

sentences.en: I don't see the point in it really. It's just stupid.
sentences.cn: 我真的不理解这到底有什么意义，简直是愚蠢透顶。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I don't want him to feel forsaken and unhappy.
sentences.cn: 我不想让他感到被抛弃而不快乐。

sentences.en: I really don't see any reason for changing it.
sentences.cn: 我真的不明白为什么要改变它。

sentences.en: If you're not satisfied with the life you're living, don't just complain. Do something about it.
sentences.cn: 对于现况的不满，不能只是抱怨，要有勇气作出改变。

sentences.en: Mommy, you don't need to stay while we talk.
sentences.cn: 妈妈,我们谈话时你不必陪着.

sentences.en: Sometimes things don't turn out the way we think they're going to.
sentences.cn: 有时事情并不像我们认为的那样发展。

sentences.en: We don't live in the lap of luxury, but we're comfortable.
sentences.cn: 我们的生活虽然并非锦衣玉食，也算是衣食无忧。

words.tran_cn: 先生，阁下；指导教师，大学教师

phrases.tran_cn: 唐乔凡尼（莫扎特于1787年作的歌剧）
n. 唐璜（西班牙传说人物）；淫荡者；游手好闲者

trans.tran_cn: 大学教师，（牛津、剑桥大学的）导师，特别研究员
trans.tran_en: a university teacher, especially one who teaches at the universities of Oxford or Cambridge
to put on a hat, coat etc
